name: Gutsy Gobbo
description:
Controls - 'C' To Crouch.   'UP' To Climb.  'Space' To Jump.   Menu- 'Esp'

Here is the prototype for Gutsy Gobbo. what you see here is the first level to our jumping platformer game which has Gobbo the main character traveling around finding rare relics from the past, this level begins with a dramatic Lava chase as you the player attempts to get out alive with the lost idol of Goblantis.

Things we want to add: things we want to add are a High Score, An introduction, adding the Player sprite, and music.- below comment what you think we should add.

We have got close to finishing the game, we want to see what people think about the game is it fun?... Challenging? or the opposite, Please post a comment to let us know what we could do to fix or improve the game thank you.
